title: Night Light Visuals
intro: You're looking at it right now! A personal portfolio website for web development and game design projects. Redesigned and built on ReactJS in August 2019.

title: RT-Tech
intro: A simple responsive landing page desgined and developed for RT-Technology to link to the company's various products and websites.

title: BabyPOS Web Platform
intro: A web platform to accompany the BabyPOS POS system where establishments can log in and view live updates on their businesses.

title: Sales Web App
intro: A simple sales web app for sales teams to track monthly sales, quotas and calculate commission.

title: SuSweet
intro: An OpenCart page setup and customised for SuSweet.

title: Eden Isle: Resort Paradise
intro: Eden Isle: Resort Paradise is a multi-award winning quirky game for iOS that lets players build and manage a holiday resort, working towards a five star resort rating.

title: Anything But Small Talk
intro: This little card game based on the themes of memory, misdirection and conversation is the first game I designed solo and it's a personal favourite!
details:
- Storytelling Card Game 
- 4+ Players 
- ~15mins Per Player

title: Night Light Visuals (2015)
intro: An older version of Night Light Visuals portfolio site first designed and developed in 2015.

title: Sketch!
intro: Sketch! is a small 2D game where your goal is to woo the girl - but don't get caught! Fill the swoon meter and get the girl before you get detention.
details:
- Orignally built for Unity Webplayer, currently being converted to WegGL 
 *Playable link coming soon!

title: This Time Around
intro: This Time Around is an interactive story/exploration game based on the themes of forgiveness and memories. Follow along Rachel Daniels' journey as she grows from an adolescent to an adult.

title: Arcade ft. Turntable
intro: Arcade is a small Unity scene developed to demonstrate a number of skills; such as Mecanim animation, AI behaviour, GUI implementation and saving/loading. Arcade also features a physics mini-game called Turntable.
details:
- Orignally built for Unity Webplayer, currently being converted to WegGL 
 *Playable link coming soon!

title: Circuits
intro: Circuits is an exciting and unique 3D abstract puzzle game that challenges players' spatial awareness. Build circuits from all angles, compete with players to be the first to reach your goal, and block any threats you see coming!

title: Hopscotch 2: Elements
intro: Hopscotch 2: Elements is an 'unnecessary sequel' designed as part of a ludology class. The task was to find a game that is over 50 years old, determine the weak points and find solutions to create a stronger game.

title: Pigeon Invasion
intro: Pigeon Invasion is a casual mobile game that was released on the App Store back in 2014. The game design was based on the classic 80's action game 'Choplifter' and was developed using GameSalad.
